data.text: Litsuwa lilila Yesu kalawa mne ing'anda ila kaghenda mmbalimbali mwe tsimbu, ako kakala hasi, kalangulitsa.
Mtingano mkulu tsaghumtsunguluka mbaka kengila mne mnumbwi na kukala amo, na iwanu wose wema mmbambali mwe tsimbu.
Kawalongela mbuli nyingi kwa imifano, kalonga,
Hayang'ali yopwililisa tsimbeghu, tsingi tsilaghalila habehi ne inzila, iwapfideghe watsa watsija.
Tsingi tsilaghalila mne ghamabwe hanu hane lidongo chidogho. Tsota himahima na kukula kwaapfila lidongo ng'alighendese hasi bae.
Lekeni litsua halilawile, imimeya inyala, na kwaapfila imitsisi ng'aighendese hasi bae imimeya isakala.
Tsimbeghu tsingi tsilaghalila mne tsimiwa, tsimiwa tsikula, tsipfingilila imimeya.
Lekeni tsingi tsilaghalila mne lidongo linoghile, tseleka, imwe mia imwe, imwe sitini, na ingi selathini.
Yane ghamaghutwi na yahulike!”
Iwanang'ina wake wamghendela wamghutsa, “Ule ulonga ne iwanu kwa imifano?”
Kawedika, “Mwemwe mtendighwa mdahe kutsimanya mbuli tsa undewa we Imulungu, lekeni wawo ng'awatendighwe apfo bae.
Kwaapfila imunu wowose yane ichinu, katsakongetsighwa ghendo, na ayula iyalihela ichinu, katsobokighwa hata achila chidodo chayalinacho.
Achino ichinu ichinitenda nilonge nawo kwa mifano. Wolola lekeni ng'awakona bae, wotegheletsa lekeni ng'awohulika wala ng'awomanya bae.
Na aghala ghalongile nabii Isaya ghatimila kuna wawo,
Mana imimoyo ye iwanu iwa mitito,
“Lekeni mwemwe mbweda! Kwaapfila tsinenge tsenu tsakona na ghamaghutwi ghenu ghohulika.
Nowalongela ghendo, manabii wengi ne iwanu we Imulungu tsawabama ng'ani wone achila chamkona mwemwe, na ukuhulika achila chamuhulika, lekeni ng'awonile bae wala ng'awahulike.
“Lelo mtegheletse mana ya ghumfano ghwe imunu iyohanda.
Imunu wowose iyohulika imbuli ya undewa lekeni ng'oielewa bae, ayo keghala na tsimbeghu itsilaghalile mnzila. Yehile kakutsa koboka achila ichihandighwe mghati mwake.
Tsimbeghu tsila itsilaghalile mna ghamabwe tseghala ne imunu yohulika imbuli na bahala koibokela kwa ndeng'elelo.
Lekeni kwaapfila kahela imitsitsi, kodudumila chidogho. Ghamaghayo na kudununzika pfing'atsa kwaajili ye imbuli, baho kakughwa.
Tsimbeghu itsilaghalile mne tsimiwa tseghala ne imunu yula iyohulika imbuli, lekeni sang'ano tse ughima uno, na kunoghela sideke utajili woihinya imbuli ayo, nae ng'akweleka bae ghamatunda.
Na tsimbeghu itsilaghalile mne lidongo linoghile tseghala ne imunu yula iyohulika imbuli ayo na kuielewa. Hayo kakweleka ghamatunda, yungi mia imwe, hayu sitini na yungi selathini.”
Yesu kawalongela keli ghumfano ghungi, “Undewa wa kulanga weghala ne imunu yahandile mbeghu inoghile mne mghunda wake.
Lekeni iwanu hawawasile, mwihile wake katsa, kuya kahanda imighughu mghati mwe uhemba kuya koka.
Uhemba hawotile na kwandusa ukweleka, imighughu nayo yoneka mne uhemba.
Watumwa wake wamghendela, wamlongela ‘Imndewa, apfi ng'uhandile mbeghu inoghile mne mghunda wako. Lelo imighughu ilawile kwani?’
Kawedika, ‘Mwihile iyo iyatendile apfo.’ Iwatumwa wake wamghutsa ‘Pfii kobama tughende tukaing'ole?’
Kawedika, ‘Bae, kwaapfila hamng'ola imighughu, mwodaha kung'ola imighughu hamwe ne uhemba.
Mleke pfose pfikule hamwe mbaka ghumsimu ghwa ukusenga. Baho nitsowalongela awala iwosenga, tanu mkunge imighughu, myowe makinzamakinza mkaghalakatse. Kuya mkunge uhemba mkeke mkano mwangu.’ ”
Yesu kawalongela ghumfano ghungi, “Undewa we Imulungu weghala ne imbeghu ndodo ya haladali. Imunu yumwe tsakaisola kaihanda mumghunda mwake.
Yenyegho ndodo kubita mbeghu tsose, na haikula, yakuwa ng'ulu kubita imimeya yose ye kumghunda. Yakuwa mbiki, apfo iwapfideghe iwali mlanga wakutsa, wotsenga ipfibali mne ghamaputila ghake.”
Yesu kawalongela keli ghumfano ghungi, “Undewa wa kulanga weghala ne hamila iisolighwe ne pinga yumwe na kuhanganya mne utimbo mwingi, nawo wose usasa.”
Yesu tsakaghulongela mtingano agha ghose kwa imifano, ng'alongile nawo bae chinu chochose chila bila ya ghumfano.
Tsakatenda apfo ghatimile ighalongingwe na nabii.
Kuya Yesu kaghuleka mtingano ghwe iwanu kaghenda mng'anda, iwanang'ina wake wamghendela, wamlongela, “Utulongele ghumfano ghwe imighughu ghutulangulitsa choni?”
Kawedika, “Imunu iyahandile imbeghu inoghile iyo Imwana we Imunu.
Mghunda iyo iisi, na imbeghu inoghile iwo iwana wa undewa we Imulungu, imighughu iwo iwana we ayula Yehile.
Na mwihile iyahandile imighughu iyo Setani. Ghamapfuno iwo utsighilo we iisi, na awala iwosenga iwo malaika.
Ka imighughu pfaikungighwa na kulakatsighwa mmoto, itsakuwa pfipfo mne utsighilo we iisi.
Imwana we Imunu katsowatuma malaika wake, wapfikunge kulawa mne undewa wake apfila pfose ipfiwahonza iwanu watende nzambi na awala wose iwotenda ghehile.
Nawo watsowasa mne ghumoto, ako watsolila na kughegheda ghamatsino.
Kuya iwanu wanoghile watsong'ala ka litsua mne undewa wa Aba wawo. Yane ghamaghutwi gha kuhulika, na yahulike.

“Undewa wa kulanga weghala na hatsina iipfisighwe mne mghunda. Imunu hayoyona, koipfisa keli. Kwa ndeng'elelo ng'ulu iyali nayo koghenda kuutsa pfose pfayali napfo, kuya kakuya na kughughula mghunda ghula.
“Pfipfila undewa wa kulanga weghala ne mchulutsi iyobama lulu inoghile,
hayoyona lulu inoghile sideke, koghenda kuutsa pfinu pfose pfayali napfo, kuya koighula lulu ayo.
“Pfipfila undewa wa kulanga weghala ne nyapfu yasighwe mne ibahali, yokunga iwasomba iwanoghile na iwehile.
Haimema, iwanu woikwegha mbaka mmbalimbali mwe ibahali, wokala hasi na kusaghula iwasomba, iwanoghile woweka mseghe, awala iwehile wowasa.
Itsakuwa pfipfo mne utsighilo we iisi, malaika watsakutsa na kuwabaghula iwanu awala wehile kulawa kwe iwanu iwanoghile,
na kuwasa mne ghumoto, ako watsolila na kughegheda ghamatsino.”
Yesu kawaghutsa, “Apfi mwoghamanya aghano ghose?”

Naye kawalongela, “Apfo chila mlangulitsi we Ghamalaghitso iyalangusighwe imbuli ye undewa wa kulanga keghala ne imunu yane ing'anda, iyolapfa ipfinu pfa sambi na pfa ghumwande kulawa mne hatsina yake.”
Yesu hayamalitse kuwalongela imifano ino, koka hanu aho,
koya ukaye yake. Kalangulitsa mne tsing'anda tse ukulombela, na awala iwamuhulike wakangawala, weghutsa, “Apfi aipatile kwani ihekima ino na pfinzonza pfino?
Ayuno si imwana wa msongola mibiki bae? Angu mai wake si Mariya bae? Na ndughu tsake si tsina Jakobu, Yosefu, Simoni na Yuda bae?
Na lumbu tsake ng'awalibaha na twetwe bae? Lelo aghapatile kwani agha ghose?”
Apfo wamhila. Lekeni Yesu kawalongela. “Nabii koteghelesighwa chila hanu, ila ng'oteghelesighwa bae ukaye yake na mng'anda mwake imwenyegho.”
Apfo ng'atendile bae pfinu pfingi pfa kukangawatsa ako, kwaapfila tsang'awamtoghole bae.
